name: Fliong
description:
*If it is not working, turn off adblock*

Fliong is rythm-based paddle game were you gain a score depending on your survival time.

Use the UP and DOWN / W  and S keys to controll the paddle.

This is my game for the MiniLD #50. It is supposed to be a Pong demake, although the only thing that make it a Pong demake is that it there is only one paddle.
